body_html: This seems quite specific - adding noise to SGD, not including any forms of momentum, and not for any other optimisers, despite the fact that the paper just requires adding noise directly to the gradients. It's not particularly complex - even the time-dependent version here - so it's questionable whether implementing this extra code path (along with tests) is worth it for a technique which is not quite uncommon.
